exceptions.exn: Abstracting over the term "X" leads to a term fun X0 : Type => cardinal X0 Full_set (FiniteT_nat_cardinal X0 H) which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "FiniteT_nat_cardinal" of type "forall X : Type, FiniteT X -> nat" cannot be applied to the terms "X0" : "Type" "H" : "FiniteT X" The 2nd term has type "FiniteT X" which should be coercible to "FiniteT X0".

original: intros X H. induction H. - apply cardinalO_empty. apply H0. - apply incl_card_le with (n := S _). + apply IHFiniteT. + apply Add_intro2.
